message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can do $105, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
